body:
I am not able to adjust radiance parameters for HB+ image based analysis. I am only able to run images with default parameters.



If I use legacy HB parameter component the recipe component complains "1. Solution exception:<type 'instance'> is not a radiance parameters."



If I use HB+ grid based parameter component (the image based parameter component only seems to produce parameters for 3-phase analysis) everything seems to be fine with the recipe component but then Run Radiance Analysis says "1. Solution exception:input rcontribParamters is not a valid parameters type."



Thoughts?
topic: Honeybee+ Radiance parameters for Image Based Analysis
